objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bg' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#8B0000;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#400000;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accent' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#333333;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#000000;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg)'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='url(#accent)' opacity='0.7'/><g opacity='0.1'><path d='M100,100 l50,0 l0,50 l-50,0 z' fill='#ffffff'/><path d='M300,200 l75,0 l0,75 l-75,0 z' fill='#ffffff'/><path d='M150,400 l60,0 l0,60 l-60,0 z' fill='#ffffff'/><path d='M400,500 l40,0 l0,40 l-40,0 z' fill='#ffffff'/><path d='M200,700 l80,0 l0,80 l-80,0 z' fill='#ffffff'/><path d='M450,800 l30,0 l0,30 l-30,0 z' fill='#ffffff'/></g><g opacity='0.1'><path d='M600,150 l70,0 l0,70 l-70,0 z' fill='#ffffff'/><path d='M750,300 l50,0 l0,50 l-50,0 z' fill='#ffffff'/><path d='M850,500 l90,0 l0,90 l-90,0 z' fill='#ffffff'/><path d='M700,700 l60,0 l0,60 l-60,0 z' fill='#ffffff'/><path d='M900,850 l40,0 l0,40 l-40,0 z' fill='#ffffff'/></g><path d='M0,1080 L540,1080 L540,0 L0,0 Z' fill='url(#bg)'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='url(#bg)'/><path d='M0,100 C 100,80 200,120 300,90 C 400,60 500,110 540,80 L 540,0 L 0,0 Z' fill='#222222' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M0,980 C 100,950 200,1000 300,970 C 400,940 500,990 540,960 L 540,1080 L 0,1080 Z' fill='#222222' opacity='0.3'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Iconic cruiser-style design with
  classic silhouette
• Powerful V-twin engine with
  smooth performance
• Custom exhaust system for
  signature deep rumble

product_details.name: Classic Cruiser: Vintage-Inspired Custom Motorcycle - Raw Power Meets Timeless Style
product_details.description:
• Iconic cruiser-style design with classic silhouette and modern engineering
• Premium disc brake system for superior stopping power and safety
• Comfortable ergonomic seating position with custom leather seat
• Powerful V-twin engine delivering smooth and reliable performance
• Custom exhaust system for that signature deep rumble
• Wide profile tires for excellent road grip and stability
• Classic round headlight with modern LED technology
• Low-slung profile with perfect weight distribution
• Chrome and black finish for striking visual appeal
• Dual shock rear suspension for comfortable riding experience
• Custom handlebar setup for optimal control and maneuverability
• Authentic retro styling with modern mechanical reliability

banner_details:
This banner design combines a bold, adventurous theme with modern styling to promote a high-performance cruiser motorcycle. The left side features a two-tone gradient background transitioning from deep crimson to maroon, giving it a dramatic and stylish look. The text layers include a futuristic sans-serif title ("heading"), an energetic subheading in a vibrant orange hue ("subheading"), and a bullet-point detail section highlighting the product features in white ("description"). The large price display ("price") is prominent in white against the red, followed by a strong call-to-action button ("cta") with dark text on an orange rectangular background ("cta_background"). The right side features a highly detailed, sketched-style image of the motorcycle ("product_image") placed over a darker gradient with subtle geometric shapes. The layout ensures a clean division between visual content and text.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Crimson: #8B0000
- Dark Maroon: #400000
- Accent Orange: #F5A623
- White: #FFFFFF
- Black: #000000
- Charcoal Gray (overlay detail): #222222
product_color: The product image features a stylized motorcycle illustration dominated by a monochrome base, enhanced with deep burgundy and subtle silver-grey highlights. The color palette blends a bold black (#000000) outline with rich maroon accents (#4B1E1E) on components like the frame and tire details. Creamy whites (#F5F5F5) and muted greys (#B0B0B0) highlight the body panels and metallic surfaces, creating a clean but industrial aesthetic. These tones are used strategically to contrast light and dark, giving the motorcycle a distinct, high-impact appearance. This palette is ideal for a banner design emphasizing rugged sophistication and a modern, minimalistic style.
